title: Angry Birds Space v2.0.1 [Mac OS X]

After a giant claw kidnaps their eggs, the Angry Birds chase it into a wormhole and find themselves floating in a strange new galaxy Ã¢â‚¬â€œ surrounded by space pigs! Luckily the Angry Birds have super powers of their own...
Angry Birds Space features over 160 interstellar levels on planets and in zero gravity, resulting in spectacular gameplay ranging from slow-motion puzzles to lightspeed destruction. With brand new birds, brand new superpowers, and a whole galaxy to explore, the sky is no longer the limit!
